agent_id.description: Id of the agent associated with this part of the call. When agent_id is positive, then user_id must be 0 and the type is 'agent_leg'

available_via.description: Ways the agent is available for incoming calls. It can be null on customer leg. Allowed values are 'browser' or 'phone'

call_charge.description: Call charge on the leg. String representation of a decimal number with six decimal places.

completion_status.description: Completion status of the leg. Allowed values are 'agent_declined', 'agent_missed', 'agent_transfer_declined', 'customer_hang_up' or 'completed'

conference_from.description: ID of agent who initiated the 3rd party conference

conference_time.description: Time that agent spent in 3rd party conference (if call has multiple conferences we will sum the conference time)

conference_to.description: ID of user or agent who joined the 3rd party conference

consultation_from.description: ID of the agent who requested the consultation

consultation_time.description: How long the agent consulted with another agent while the customer was on hold. null if there was no consultation

consultation_to.description: The id of the agent who received and accepted the consultation request. null if there was no transfer

created_at.description: When the leg object was created

duration.description: How long in seconds the leg existed

forwarded_to.description: Phone number the call was forwarded to. Example: '+1311123456789'. It can be null on customer leg

hold_time.description: How long in seconds the leg existed

talk_time.description: How long in seconds the agent was in conference with the customer for this leg

transferred_from.description: The id of the agent who initialized the transfer. This value must be 0 on the first agent's leg. null if there was no transfer

transferred_to.description: The id of the agent who received and accepted the transfer request

type.description: The type of the leg. Allowed values are 'customer', 'agent', 'external' or 'supervisor'

updated_at.description: When the leg object was last updated

user_id.description: Id of the customer or user associated with this part of the call. When user_id is positive then agent_id must be 0 and the type is customer_leg

wrap_up_time.description: How long in seconds the leg was in wrap up. It can be null on customer leg
